name: Pentagon Maze
description:
There a 2 challenge that you can play, like Easy & Hard. In easy it's day light with arrow sign and In hard it's dark night like a scary game with 5 arrow sign & candle as a light for walking. When you find the end sign and fall, Just wait for a few seconds when falling and you win it. Available in 2 Language (EN/ID)

Actually this game is not by me, i found this game source on github also has been deprecated too (28/01/2013)

Controls: Arrow Key / WASD for Movement | Moving the Camera using Mouse.
